The holy scythe of Vitur is the scythe of vitur with a holy ornament kit attached to it. The ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add Saradominist aesthetics to the scythe.

While the scythe is untradeable in its ornamented and charged state, it can be discharged anytime at the Theatre of Blood bank, and then dismantled returning the scythe and the kit.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
16 June 2021
(update)
  • The holy scythe of Vitur will now provide protection from Saradominists in the God Wars Dungeon.
  • A graphical issue in which the scythe was stretching in certain circumstances has been fixed.
  • The scythe's inventory icon has been improved to better reflect the item itself.

The '''holy scythe of Vitur''' is the [[scythe of vitur]] with a [[holy ornament kit]] attached to it. The ornament kit gives no additional bonuses, and is only used to add [[Saradomin]]ist aesthetics to the scythe.

While the scythe is untradeable in its ornamented and charged state, it can be discharged anytime at the [[Theatre of Blood]] bank, and then dismantled returning the scythe and the kit.
